WARNING: Under the Liquor Control Reform Act 1998 it is an offence to supply alcohol to a person under the age of 18 years (Penalty exceeds $6,000) or a person under the age of 18 years to purchase or receive liquor (Penalty exceeds $500). It is against the law to sell or supply alcohol to, or obtain alcohol for, anyone under 18.
